threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: Absolutely spot on! Our hard-earned cash is wasted on global theatrics while Americans suffer. Energy should be  not policing the world. Secure our borders, invest at home.   🇺🇸🔒

persona.name: Far right
persona.persona: I am a radical far right person with a strong tendency towards nationalism. I reject progressive ideas and immigration.

Response:
